self_predictions.prediction_summary: John feels healthy and well-rested, focusing on maintaining his health and avoiding inflammation. He believes his experience and technique will give him an edge over Petrenko.
self_predictions.style_conflict: John plans to keep the match outside to avoid Petrenko's inside control.

Oleg Petrenko.strength: Strong but not as technical as Ongarbaev
Oleg Petrenko.previous_match_summary: Petrenko has shown strong performances but struggles with wrist control against top rollers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John believes Ermes has the speed and side pressure to control the match if he avoids getting into a defensive position.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes needs to avoid letting Chaffee get behind his arm and focus on aggressive top rolling.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has shown adaptability but struggles against strong inside pullers.
